sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ import React from "react"; import "./Shared.css"; import "./Instruction.css"; export const Instruction: React.FC = () => { return (

Instructions a five year old can follow.

Follow our cheerful saccadic target (yes, the dot) with quiet focus as it sweeps the dial. Give the digital crown a spin to find a comfortable speed.

As the dot passes over the light blue tick marks, breath in, filling your belly, then your chest.

As the dot passes over the white tick mark, arrest your breathing without tensing.

As the dot passes over the brown tick marks, slowly breath out through your nose, empty your lungs from the top down, drop your shoulders and relax.

A few minutes a day, every day.

); };
